parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the cluster.

You can call the [ListClusters](~~87116~~) operation to query the cluster ID.

parameters.name: CommandId
parameters.description:
The ID of the command.

You can call the [ListCommands](~~87388~~) operation to query the command ID.

parameters.name: Instance
parameters.description: The information of nodes on which the command is run.

parameters.name: InvokeRecordStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the command that you want to query. Valid values:

*   Finished
*   Running
*   Failed
*   Stopped

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return.

Page numbers start from 1.

Default value: 1

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 1 to 50.

Default value: 10
